channel.title: Tops on Mike Hadlow
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Mike Hadlow

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I am Mike Hadlow. I am a software developer, based in the UK. I’ve been building software professionally for over 20 years using Microsoft development tools and technologies and since 2002 primarily with .NET. Since 1998 I have worked as an independent contractor with my own consulting company, Suteki Ltd. During that time I’ve worked on a large range of projects in many different industries, ranging from finance and insurance to the music business.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Service Address Email mike@suteki.co.uk Twitter @mikehadlow GitHub @mikehadlow
